title: GAMESTOP NFTs via ImmutableX | Robbie Ferguson
itunes:title: GAMESTOP NFTs via ImmutableX | Robbie Ferguson
description:
GAMESTOP! is announcing they're partnering with zk-rollup Immutable X, to open up an NFT marketplace! 

Immutable and Gamestop are also creating an up to $100 million fund dedicated to supporting the gaming ecosystem on Immutable X.
